short_summary: Better understanding of forest and wood use mitigation strategies to enhance carbon sequestration
description: Natural Resources Canada seeks proposals for better understanding of the relative potential of forest and wood use mitigation strategies to enhance sequestration of carbon in Canada's forests and harvested wood products, and challenges affecting their implementation.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement #### Title Forest and Wood Use Mitigation Strategies and Implementation Challenges #### Tender Description

This request for proposal seeks input from bidders on forest and wood use mitigation strategies for enhancing carbon sequestration in Canada's forests and harvested wood products. The request aims to identify the relative potential of such strategies and examine the challenges hindering their implementation. The contract period is from the tender award date to March 31, 2024.
